name: Mystery Hill
description:
This is a low poly 3D person platformer about a magical awakened rune golem. The movement is timeing based, whith moveing obstacles and simple enemys.



Platform : Windows Controls : Keyboard and Mouse : [WASD], [E], [Esc], [P] and [Space] Gamepad :  [Left Joystick], [Right Joystick], [XA], [Start] Made for the HTK-3 semester 2021-2022 Theme:      Jump and Run Engine :     Unreal Made by : Robert Helm
